youtube.description:
Arik of Spiral presents: Constraints and rationale for changes to the Lightning protocol necessary for Taproot-based channels.

Speaker Twitter: https ://twitter.com/arikaleph
Learn more about Spiral: https://spiral.xyz/

btcpp website: https ://btcplusplus.dev/
